p: Next we observed that lemon grass oil and palm rosa essential oil showed higher bactericidal activity than streptomycin and chloramphenicol, and comparable activity with ampicillin and gentamicin. Similarly the major component of lemon grass essential oil, citral showed higher bactericidal activity than ampicillin, streptomycin, and chloramphenicol against some bacteria. The antibacterial activity of palm rosa was higher than streptomycin against P. aeruginosa, X. oryzae and X. malvaceraum.
